<script type="text/javascript" wd_script_id="featurebox_social_ajax_script" nonce="MDZlMzkxOGZhNjBiNzkwNTViNDE1MzE5ZmI0MDFhMGFmZjNjYjFjOQ==">
			webDriver.jQuery(function ($) {
				var args = {
					ajax: "featurebox_social"
				};
				$(".wd_featurebox_social_ajax").each(function() {
					var $self = $(this);
					args["fb_id"] = $self.attr("wd_featurebox_social_id");
					$.get(
						"https://boeing.mediaroom.com/social-media-center",
						args,
						function(data) {
							var $parent = $self.parent();
							$self.replaceWith(data);
							webDriver.queueCallback(function(){webDriver.doLoad($parent);});
						},
						"html"
					);
				});
			});
		</script>

			})

					$('#stockper').html('');

					//$('#stockdate').html(element.TradeDate + 'ET');

				});
			})
			.fail(function () {
				var dater = moment().format('MMM D, h:mm A') + ' ET';
				$('#stockprice').html('');
				$('#stockchange').html('');
				$('#stockper').html('');
				$('#stockdate').html(dater);
			});
